name: MilkSnake
description:
MilkSnake is a new take on the classical snake game. It is played on the surface of various 3D shapes, such as a sphere, a torus and even a Möbius strip! You use intuitive and smooth touch controls to move your snake around.

Earn points to unlock new levels with different mindbending visual styles and relaxing music (by Ken 'coda' Snyder)!

Enjoy this gentle introduction to non-euclidean geometry!

Also see the official website: http://milksnake.c3.cx/
